page.title: 15A day in my life, Kesgrave
page.content:
I get up at 6.30 and go downstairs and have breakfast and then help wash up. I then go upstairs and have a wash and get dressed. I usually sort out my school bag and go to school at 8.45. We go in at 9 o'clock, have the register and then got to the hall for Assembly. We have Maths or Spellings until playtime at 10.30 which lasts for 20 minutes. More lessons and then I go home for dinner at 12 o'clock. At 1.30 school starts again and we do art work, games or story until home-time at 3.30.
At home I have to do a little home- work. I have my tea at 5 o'clock, play or watch television until bedtime at about 9.30 pm.
